SEARCH
Package model

Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
model.User
model.Doctor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Doctor extends User
Represents a doctor in the Hospital Management System (HMS). Manages doctor-specific attributes, such as schedule, appointment requests, and patient counters. Provides functionality to handle appointments and their related actions.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String id, String name, String gender, int age)
      Constructs a Doctor with the specified ID, name, gender, and age. Initializes the schedule, appointment requests list, and patient appointment counter.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the doctor.
      name - The name of the doctor.
      gender - The gender of the doctor.
      age - The age of the doctor.

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String id, String name, String password)
      Constructs a Doctor with the specified ID, name, and password. Initializes the schedule, appointment requests list, and patient appointment counter.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the doctor.
      name - The name of the doctor.
      password - The password for the doctor.

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String id, String name)
      Constructs a Doctor with the specified ID and name. Password defaults to "password".
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the doctor.
      name - The name of the doctor.

      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, or null otherwise.

    • findTimeSlot

      public TimeSlot findTimeSlot(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Finds a timeslot in the doctor's schedule by date and time.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the timeslot.
      time - The time of the timeslot.
      Returns:
      The TimeSlot object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getRequests

      public ArrayList<AppointmentRequest> getRequests()
      Retrieves the list of appointment requests associated with the doctor.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of AppointmentRequest objects.

    • addAppointmentCounter

      public void addAppointmentCounter(Patient patient)
      Increments the appointment counter for a specified patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose counter to increment.

    • subtractAppointmentCounter

      public void subtractAppointmentCounter(Patient patient)
      Decrements the appointment counter for a specified patient. If the count reaches zero, the patient is removed from the counter.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose counter to decrement.

    • createController

      public SessionController createController(Scanner scanner)
      Creates a SessionController for the doctor. Accesses the doctor's dashboard.
      Specified by:
      createController in class User
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner for user input.
      Returns:
      A new DoctorController instance for the doctor.
